title: Beach Yoga
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>This is the first time I did beach yoga. It’s pretty nice to do it while hearing the sound of the waves. Thank you for inviting me, Mari<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, I’m happy that you took an interest in it. It’s easy because your body is so flexible, right Eli?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eeh!? That’s not true<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Huh, is that so? It doesn’t look like it….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>It was surprisingly hard to maintain some of the poses. I used some muscles that I don’t normally use, so I was trembling….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Okay! Then, Mari will help you♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Thanks, it would he-.... What’s with that face?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>What? What might you be talking about~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>And what are those hands? If you’re gonna do stuff like Nozomi, then I have so ideas too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>There’s no need to worry, Eli~. Just leave it a~ll to Mari…. Alright♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
